title: 2020 Cannabis Foresight + Year-End Rap With Javier Hasse
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Javier Hasse is the author of the book Start Your Own Cannabis Business and an award-winning reporter and editor who focuses on the cannabis space as well as a Billboard-charting rapper. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss getting into the industry by chance, his thoughts on the space going into 2020, and why he's bullish on cannabis as a whole. We also cover the global cannabis landscape, how the US is similar to the EU, why regulatory implementation is always very complex and why you shouldn't totally count out Canadian LPs. Plus, we drop our year end rap! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
